Actions.Name: Add a member to a group
Actions.Description: Add a member to a Microsoft 365 group or a security group through the members navigation property.

Actions.Name: Delete user
Actions.Description: Delete a user. When deleted, user resources are moved to a temporary container and can be restored within 30 days. After that time, they are permanently deleted.

Actions.Name: Delete Spinpanel user group
Actions.Description: Delete a user group.

Actions.Name: Remove a member from a user group
Actions.Description: Remove a member to a user group.

Actions.Name: Get Azure AD security groups
Actions.Description: Get a list of Azure AD security groups of all organizations you are authorized to view.

Actions.Name: List organization domains
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of domain objects.

Actions.Name: Get user details
Actions.Description: Get a user by Microsoft object identifier.

Actions.Name: Get spinpanel user groups
Actions.Description: Get a list of groups of all organizations you are authorized to view.

Actions.Name: Get locales
Actions.Description: Get locales.

Actions.Name: Get organizations
Actions.Description: Get all organizations you are authorized to view.

Actions.Name: Get organization subscribed SKUs
Actions.Description: Get the list of commercial subscriptions that an organization has acquired.

Actions.Name: Get subscriptions
Actions.Description: Retrieves all subscriptions for the customer of a partner by their active directory tenant identifier.

Actions.Name: Get user license details
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of license details objects for enterprise users.

Actions.Name: Get users
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of user objects.

Actions.Name: User change password
Actions.Description: Update the password profile of a user to reset their password.

Actions.Name: Update subscription quantity
Actions.Description: Update the quantity of a subscription.

Actions.Name: Create Azure AD group
Actions.Description: Create azure AD group.

Actions.Name: Create user
Actions.Description: The request body contains the user to create. At a minimum, you must specify the required properties for the user. You can optionally specify any other writable properties.

Actions.Name: Add a member to a user group
Actions.Description: Add a member to a user group, the member should belong to the same organization as the group.

Actions.Name: Assign a license to a user
Actions.Description: Add or remove licenses for the user. You can also enable and disable specific plans associated with a license.

Actions.Name: Remove member
Actions.Description: Remove a member from a group via the members navigation property.

Actions.Name: Get a list of Spinpanel user group members
Actions.Description: Get a list of user group members of a specific group.
